long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of converting recipe measurements from cups, teaspoons, or other regional units to grams? Kulinary simplifies your cooking experience by automatically converting any recipe’s native metrics into a standardized format like grams. Whether you’re following a recipe online or your favorite blog, Kulinary will also extract and neatly display all the ingredients for quick reference.

Features:

	•	Automatic conversion of various units (cups, ounces, etc.) into grams.
	•	Clean, easy-to-read ingredient lists for any recipe.
	•	Works seamlessly on popular recipe sites and blogs.

Simplify your cooking, save time on conversions, and cook like a pro with Kulinary!
